Package org.hibernate.shards.session

Interface Summary
ControlSessionProvider Interface for any entity that can provide the control session.
OpenSessionEvent Interface for events that can be laziliy applied to a Session.
RequiresSession Interface describing an object that can have a Session set on it.
ShardedSession The main runtime inteface between Java application and Hibernate Shards.
ShardedSession represents a logical transaction that might be spanning multiple shards.
ShardedSessionFactory Shard-aware extension to SessionFactory.
StatefulInterceptorFactory Interface describing an object that knows how to create Interceptors.
 

Class Summary
BaseStatefulInterceptorFactory  
SetSessionOnRequiresSessionEvent OpenSessionEvent which sets the provided Session on a RequiresSession.
SetupTransactionOpenSessionEvent OpenSessionEvent which adds newly opened session to the specified ShardedTransaction.
ShardedSessionFactoryImpl Shard-aware implementation of SessionFactory.
ShardedSessionImpl Concrete implementation of a ShardedSession, and also the central component of Hibernate Shards' internal implementation.
SubsetShardedSessionFactoryImpl This class extends ShardedSessionFactoryImpl and is constructed by supplying a subset of shardIds that are primarily owned by a ShardedSessionFactoryImpl.
 

Exception Summary
ShardedSessionException Main exception used in Hibernate Shards.
